scripts.start:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run start # Start app in test mode
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && start-server-and-test start:test http://localhost:3000 'cypress:run'
scripts.test:vns: jest --testPathPattern=tests/vns # run tests for Vulcan Next Starter itself, eg scripts (long)
scripts.coverage:e2e: cross-env COVERAGE=1 npm run build && start-server-and-test start:test http://localhost:3000 'COVERAGE=1 cypress run'
scripts.precoverage: rm -rf .nyc_output || true # delete previous nyx instrumentation
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:unit && npm run coverage:e2e
scripts.postcoverage: npm run report:combined # combine jest and cypress coverage reports
scripts.mkdir:reports: rm -Rf reports && mkdir reports || true # intermediate script
scripts.copy:reports: cp coverage-e2e/coverage-final.json reports/from-cypress.json && cp coverage-unit/coverage-final.json reports/from-jest.json # intermediate scripts
scripts.precombine:reports: npm run copy:reports && rm -Rf .nyc_output && mkdir .nyc_output || true # intermediate script
scripts.combine:reports: nyc merge reports && mv coverage.json .nyc_output/out.json # intermediate script
scripts.report:combined: nyc report --reporter lcov --report-dir coverage | exit 0 # intermediate script
